column1: The funeral will be held on Wednesday
column3: 2015 at 9 am from the Potvin-Quinn Funeral Home
column5: West Warwick with a Mass of Christian Burial at 10 am in Our Lady of Good Counsel Church
column7: West Warwick. Interment will be in the Notre Dame Cemetery in West Warwick. Visiting hours are Tuesday 6-8 pm.
